titles.title: A resolution designating the week of February 5 through February 9, 2007, as "National School Counseling Week".
A resolution designating the week of February 5 through February 9, 2007, as "National School Counseling Week".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Designates the week of February 5-February 9, 2007, as National School Counseling Week.
